DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine efficacy methotrexate cytarabine chemotherapy combination whole-brain radiation therapy patient non-AIDS related primary central nervous system lymphoma . II . Assess response rate safety chemotherapy regimen . OUTLINE : Patients receive first course chemotherapy soon possible diagnosis staging . Methotrexate ( MTX ) IV administer 40-60 minute day 1 15 . Cytarabine ( AraC ) administer intrathecally day 1 15 . The second course chemotherapy begin day 29 bone marrow recovery . Radiation therapy begin later 3 week complete chemotherapy . Patients follow death . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A maximum 50 patient accrue .
